text: Elisabeth Cornelia "Els" Vader (married Scharn) (24 September 1959 – 8 February 2021) was a Dutch track and field sprinter. She competed at the 1980, 1984 and 1988 Summer Olympics in the 100 m, 200 m and 4 × 100 m relay (in 1988 only), but failed to reach the finals in any event. Vader died from thyroid cancer on 8 February 2021, aged 61.Voormalig topatlete Els Vader (61) overleden ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from thyroid cancer Category:Olympians for the Netherlands Category:People from Vlissingen Category:Sportspeople from Zeeland Category:Dutch sprinters
title: Els Vader
